name: Country Park
description: Immerse yourself in an unforgettable world of park simulation! Become the main character who walks around the beautiful country park and get a lot of emotions and impressions. Become the most frequent visitor to the park and learn every millimeter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i-3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce series 1024MB Memory Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i-5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce series 2048MB Memory Storage: 2 GB available space
